description:
There are so many free videos on You Tube telling you how to get an appointment, what to say in the meeting, how to close and negotiate a deal ….. but hardly any emphasis is placed on putting a sales plan together before taking action to make your life so much easier.

No matter where you are in your sales career, this course is for you.

Created by an experienced marketer with multiple offline marketing and selling courses, this course will show you how to .....

  • analyze your sales, customers and products profitably
  • research market trends and your competition
  • define your target audience
  • build a pipeline of qualified prospects
  • set and consistently achieve realistic sales targets
  • boost your sales quickly
  • define your product offering and its pricing
  • measure your performance
  • your next steps to get started quickly

In addition to the step-by-step videos illustrating every step of the process, you will receive .....

Transcripts of each lecture

Action Steps to complete

The Formula for sales target setting

Questions: Answer YOUR questions to this course content - by ME, personally

So now I present you with a choice. You know that if you fail to plan, you plan to fail. So through door # 1, you stay as you are …. stressing to achieve monthly targets and being frustrated that you're not living the lifestyle you want. … or door #2, you take this course, create your sales plan, achieve your monthly sales targets with ease and have a lot more free time to do what you want with your life. The choice is yours!

I look forward to helping you create a smart sales plan to achieve your targets and enjoy becoming a super sales person ahead of the pack.

Your success is My Success!
title: Achieving Exceptional Results With Your Sales Plan
